EmailTemplate.description: Used to notify Currency Center users that the Monthly report has been published.
EmailTemplate.name: Currency Center New Monthly Report Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: New Monthly Report available
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Currency Center users,
This month's currency repatriation report is now published.
Should you have any feedback, comments or queries, please log a case on your IATA customer portal under "Currency Center" topic.
Kind regards, Currency Center Team
